name: Cranest Tales - Tibern
description:
Cranest Tales - Tibern

This game was originally made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 33. The theme was " You are the monster". You can download the Jam and the Post-Jam versions below.

Welcome to Tibern, an island in the world of Crannest. It is home for the Grallys and the Syers, two types of monsters capable of killing any human in sight.
As a Grally Minion, you must protect the boss from human adventurers traveling in the island.
